en_us: Press {keybind:Share Item} on a gear item to share it in chat or save it.
In Overlay Management you can move, resize and change alignments of all overlays.
Every single feature in Wynntils can be toggled on or off. Most features have additional options too, check them out in Settings menu.
With Info Boxes and Custom Bars you can display nearly anything you want on your screen using Functions. Join our Discord server to find many community made overlays.
Got a question? Found a bug or want to suggest something? Join our Discord server and share what you want with {command:wynntils discord}.
Remember to check for updates from time to time. Wynntils updates quite frequently and may contain important compatibility fixes.
Press {keybind:Screenshot Item} on an item to make a screenshot of it.
Press {keybind:View player's gear} on a player to inspect their gear.
Creating a Wynntils Account will let you equip custom cosmetics. To create an account, use {command:wynntils token}.
With the Container Scroll feature you can use your mouse scroll to navigate pages in most paginated containers with ease.
Some features rely on the scoreboard being enabled, make sure you have it enabled by running {command:toggle scoreboard}.
Enable autotracking with {command:toggle autotracking} to ensure your content tracker will always update.
Want to focus on or remove certain chat types? Use Chat Tabs to configure what chat messages you see.
Unable to see content or lootrun beacons? Be sure to enable them with {command:toggle beacons}
Waypoint markers too big? Reduce their size with the Scale option in the Waypoint Distance feature!
Want to quickly find more of the same item on the trade market? Press {keybind:Quick Search TM} whilst hovering an item to instantly search for it.
